section.title: Description
section.p: The Flavors Administration plugin allows you to add new flavors, modify existing flavors, and delete flavors from your blog. Flavors are used to display entries from your blog in a particular format. The flavors that you can add or modify on your blog must use existing templates in the individual templates directory.
